title: Adrian Peterson Traded, Browns QB Change, Best Team In NFC (Football 10/11)
description:
Nick Kostos, Pete Prisco and Jason La Canfora cover plenty of football, but start by talking futbol, and the United States' embarrassing failure to make the World Cup (1:10). Gridiron chat follows as the guys discuss the Adrian Peterson trade to the Cardinals (5:30),  the Browns naming Kevin Hogan their Week 6 starting QB (6:44), what to make of Tom Brady's reported injury (14:40),  and who they are picking in Panthers-Eagles set for Thursday night (15:04). Topics on this week's edition of 'Hot Take or Just Right' include; both the Cowboys and Raiders will miss the playoffs, the Jets will win their 4th straight game this week, and the Jags will win the AFC South.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy

itunes:author: CBS Sports, Football, NFL, NFL Picks, NFL Betting, 2022 NFL, NFL Predictions, NFL Recap
itunes:subtitle: Nick Kostos, Pete Prisco and Jason La Canfora discuss the Adrian Peterson trade, the Browns QB change, Tom Brady's injury, and even a little USA soccer.
